concise_definition: n. 人名：布莱恩（姓氏或名字）

definitions.explanation_en: A proper noun used as a surname or given name, primarily of English origin, often associated with historical or public figures.
definitions.explanation_cn: 用作姓氏或名字的专有名词，主要源于英语，常与历史人物或公众人物相关联。
definitions.example_en: James G. Blaine was a prominent American politician in the late 19th century.
definitions.example_cn: 詹姆斯·G·布莱恩是19世纪末美国一位著名的政治家。
